about_the_game:
Gods Wars : infinity Epic is a pixel action role-playing game with rogue-like elements. Through a series of choices, players acquire epic artifacts, enhance epic equipment, upgrade epic skills, choose their epic pets, and ultimately confront formidable evil gods!

This is a casual pixel fantasy-style game, where the flames of war engulf the continent and gods of various races descend to the earth. In order to compete for resources and divine power, survive as much as possible. Collect coins and soul crystals from each battle to strengthen yourself and your companions, and welcome the ultimate victory together!

Collect more artifacts to enhance your abilities.


Choose a set of equipment that suits you, handy skills, and specialize in one aspect (critical strike, elemental, physical, summoning, speed, area, projectile).


Challenge epic bosses to obtain fragments of their divinity.


Choose suitable pet companions; the more of the same race, the more bonuses provided.


Tips:
At the respawn point, choose your profession, artifact, and deity.
Complete the NPC task in the first level as soon as possible and unlock the merchants in the Divine Kingdom.
Before starting the level, talk to the blacksmith and craft a handy weapon.
Take a stroll around the city to acquire some initial items and pets.

Supports mouse, keyboard, and controller.

short_description: Come and defeat the evil gods! Create your personal outfit, overcome the siege of numerous monsters and leaders, and usher in a new victory! Gods Wars is a pixel ARPG Rogue like Game. You can obtain epic artifacts, upgrade epic skills, choose your epic pet, face the powerful evil gods!
